comment.author: 77345821@N06
comment._content: This is the wreckage of the Pfalz D.IIIa shot down by 1/Lt. Douglas Campbell of the 94th Aero Squadron. It was flown by Uffz. Simon (some say Anton Wroniecki). The wreckage of this aircraft and of the Albatros D.Va shot down by squadronmate 1/Lt. Alan Winslow, were both displayed in the town square of Toul.
